doc.after: Germany has a civil law system based on Roman law with some references to Germanic law The Bundesverfassungsgericht Federal Constitutional Court is the German Supreme Court responsible for constitutional matters with power of judicial review 31 80 Germany s supreme court system called Oberste Gerichtsh fe des Bundes is specialised for civil and criminal cases the highest court of appeal is the inquisitorial Federal Court of Justice and for other affairs the courts are the Federal Labour Court the Federal Social Court the Federal Finance Court and the Federal Administrative Court
